ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND(CH_Outage_Units_ODR__r.Name="Percent Affected", ISCHANGED(CH_UnitsTotal1__c), CH_UnitsTotal1__c<>100 ), AND(CH_Outage_Units_ODR__r.Name="Percent Affected", ISCHANGED(CH_UnitsAffected1__c), OR(CH_UnitsAffected1__c > 100, CH_UnitsAffected1__c < 0) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If the field “Select a unit” is set to “Percent Affected” the field “Units Total” should be set to “100” and the field “Units Affected” should be set in the range 0-100
